member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.ullGenerationId
member.summary: The current network generation (incremented each time the configuration is changed).

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.ullFlags
member.summary: Flags for the proxy settings (for example, WINHTTP_PROXY_TYPE_DIRECT).

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.pcwszAutoconfigUrl
member.summary: The PAC URL for the network (for example, L"http://proxy.contoso.com/wpad.dat").

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.pcwszProxy
member.summary: The proxy address and port for HTTP traffic (for example, L"http://192.168.1.1:8888").

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.pcwszSecureProxy
member.summary: The proxy address and port for HTTPS traffic (for example, L"http://192.168.1.1:8888").

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.cProxyBypasses
member.summary: The number of entries in the proxy bypass list (rgpcwszProxyBypasses).

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.rgpcwszProxyBypasses
member.summary: An array of strings containing each site in the proxy bypass list. (for example, L"contoso.com").

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.dwInterfaceIndex
member.summary: The interface index for which settings were retrieved.

member.name: WINHTTP_PROXY_SETTINGS_EX.pcwszConnectionName
member.summary: The WCM connection name for which settings were retrieved.
